summary: Herein are patches for a few of the Velexia's Animals Are Not Monsters mods, compatible with Requiem 1.9.2
descriptionHtml:
These are patches for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69934/?]Animals are not Monsters[/url] mods released by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1212563]Velexia[/url]
I have tested these files extensively in my own game and am quite satisfied with the results
All files are replacers. The original mod is not needed.

I have only provided files for those mods which I use myself - Requiem, Requiem + Animallica, and Requiem + Immersive Creatures

All mods must be loaded AFTER Requiem.esp
The patch for Immersive Creatures must be loaded AFTER Requiem - Immersive Creatures.esp
The patch for Animallica must be loaded AFTER Requiem - Animallica.esp


The Requiem Patch requires:
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem 1.9.2[/url]

The Requiem + Animallica Patch requires:
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57413/?]Animallica[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem 1.9.2[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61621/?]Requiem Animallica Patch[/url]

The Requiem + Immersive Creatures Patch requires:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]
Dawnguard
Hearthfire
Dragonborn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?]Skyrim Immersive Creatures + Dragonborn edition[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem 1.9.2[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61621/?]Requiem Immersive Creatures Patch[/url]
author: LosGrak
